title: Growing corn in garden organically | How-2-Do It Guide Step By Step | Best Guide

tasks.task: Prepare the soil for planting corn at home or in a garden
subtasks: Digging the soil with a fork to make it uniform
Pre-soaking corn seeds in water for 3-4 hours
Breaking organic fertilizer into fine powder by hand
Removing stones or pebbles from the fertilizer
Mixing soil and fertilizer using a spade and fork
Ensuring a fine composition of soil and fertilizer by breaking sand blocks or chunks
Creating an elevated planting area (at least 10 cm high) using soil
Sowing corn seeds at a depth of 1 inch, spaced 15-20 cm apart
Waiting 7-10 days for corn sprouts to emerge
Monitoring and ensuring proper moisture and conditions for growth
